Articles.Content:
Hello! Been playing the game since it was released on steam, but figured I should finally sign up the forums here.

Now I just need to figure out how to set up my profile...

Hello ChibiCD, and welcome to the forum.

Don't bother trying to customize your profile just yet, because you'll need to post a few more times before the forum software believes you are not a spambot and gives you that permission.

Hello. Welcome aboard!

Once your get over 5 posts, you can edit your avatar.
5, I thought it was 3. Anyway welcome to the forums. Come join us over at the forum games!
